p: Furthermore, it was noted that compound 127 induced the accumulation of excess reactive oxygen species (ROS), which can give rise to other molecular responses such as autophagy. This was observed as compound 127 increased autophagy marker levels early and provoked the conversion of Light Chain 3 (LC3) -I to LC3-II, which directly indicates autophagy. Adding these results to those observed in flow cytometry, the authors suggested that compound 127 induced autophagy.
